product_name: Swix Sonic R4 Adjustable Ski Poles - Pair
long_description: Made with 6000-series aluminum upper and lower sections, the Swix Sonic R4 adjustable ski poles give you lightweight, stiff and durable performance for most backcountry conditions. Durable, adjustable locking system provides reliable performance so your pole won't slip when you're climbing steep hills or skiing down in the backcountry. Swix Sonic locking system has two fixed positions that make it easy and quick to switch from walking up mode to skiing down mode. Poles have a usable length that adjusts 25cm: 105 - 130cm, 115 - 140cm or 125 - 150cm, depending on the size you purchase. Lightweight, grippy thermoplastic rubber-coated handles are easy to hold onto; hook shape on top of the grips can be used to adjust bindings and boot buckles. Straps include adjustable padding for extra comfort; self-locking system ensures quick adjustments. Swix Sonic R4 adjustable ski poles include interchangeable powder baskets; coated nylon fabric is lightweight and provides great flotation in soft snow.
